channel.title: command on Morgoth
channel.description: Recent content in command on Morgoth

item.title: Command
item.description: telnet 1 telnet nc/netcat 1 2 nc -z IP PORT # 查看指定tcp://ip:port是否监听 nc -zu IP PORT # 查看udp://ip:port是否监听 ping 1 2 $ sudo apt-get install iputils-ping ping # 用于确定

item.title: Command
item.description: sysstat: 1 2 3 4 5 6 # <https://github.com/sysstat/sysstat> $ sudo apt-get install sysstat # 包括 iostat/mpstat/pidstat/tapestat/cifsiostat # 查看diskio信息 $ sudo iostat iotop 1 2 3 # 查看进程的diskio $ sudo apt-get install iotop $ sudo iotop df df计算文件系统磁盘空间使
